entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening and ending before morning then 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
